item.description:
Funseeker member Len has been gracious  to open up his Maine home to us for the weekend of January 13-15th. The house is located in Bridgton ME, about 40 miles west of Portland on Long Lake.

Our venture will take 3 to 3.5 hours each way, well worth the trip to enjoy tubing, skiing (cross country-or downhill), antique shops, dining, brewpubs, ice fishing,snowshoeing or hiking, outside firepit, beer pong, cribbage and MORE!

Accomodations are approximatly 13 people give or take - some air mattresses and most beds will sleep 2. Bring sleeping bags and or linens, and towels. 

$5.00 per head per night (house rules to help pay utilities ect.)

We will carpool and circulate a food list to easily take care of meals. Those who have a decent size car or van and would like to drive, please let me know. Gas contributions for anyone who drives.

Thanks to Len for his hospitality, this is going to be a great weekend!!!
item.name: Weekend Trip to Maine!
